sentences.sContent: The scientists tried playing the same sound sample again with another group, and they got pissed, too -- virtually every finch that heard it, in fact.
sentences.sContent_eng: The scientists tried playing the same sound sample again with another group, and they got pissed, too -- virtually every finch that heard it, in fact.
sentences.sCn: 而科学家们对另外一群孟加拉雀们播放同样的叫声，他们同样也很生气。 事实上每一只鸟都是如此。

remMethod.val: fin(鳍， 鱼翅) + ch(音似： 翅) → 雀类和鱼类都有翅 → 雀类

trans.tranOther: a small bird with a short beak
